Control_Boost_Common.display_help: Equipping the Control Hybrid power grants you a resistance bonus to all crowd control effects.

Doublehit_Grant.display_help: Toggle: Chance for Psionic damage to Controlled enemies, Chance for Psionic damage to low health enemies. This ability gives a 75% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Note that Doublehit Grant is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

Lockout.display_help: Using Hybrid abilities can be extremely taxing, limiting you to using it for up to two minutes at a time.

Hybrid_Active.display_help: Using Hybrid abilities can be extremely taxing, limiting you to using it for up to two minutes at a time.
